net.corda.core.transactions

Class BaseTransaction

  • net.corda.core.transactions.BaseTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NamedByHash
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreTransaction, FullTransaction

    public class BaseTransaction
implements NamedByHash

    An abstract class defining fields shared by all transaction types in the system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseTransaction()
      An abstract class defining fields shared by all transaction types in the system.

      T      		 findOutput(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.util.function.Predicate<T> predicate)
      Helper to simplify finding a single output matching a Predicate.
      java.util.List<?> getInputs()
      The inputs of this transaction. Note that in BaseTransaction subclasses the type of this list may change!
      Party getNotary()
      If present, the notary for this transaction. If absent then the transaction is not notarised at all. This is intended for issuance/genesis transactions that don't consume any other states and thus can't double spend anything.
      ContractState getOutput(int index)
      Helper to simplify getting an indexed output.
      java.util.List<net.corda.core.contracts.ContractState> getOutputStates()
      Helper property to return a list of interface ContractState objects, rather than the often less convenient class TransactionState
      java.util.List<net.corda.core.contracts.TransactionState> getOutputs()
      Ordered list of states defined by this transaction, along with the associated notaries.
      java.util.List<?> getReferences()
      A list of reusable reference data states which can be referred to by other contracts in this transaction.
      <T extends ContractState>
      StateAndRef<T>      		 outRef(int index)
      Returns a class StateAndRef for the given output index.
      <T extends ContractState>
      StateAndRef<T>      		 outRef(ContractState state)
      Returns a class StateAndRef for the requested output state, or throws IllegalArgumentException if not found.

      Helper to simplify getting all output class StateAndRef items of a particular state class, interface, or base class.

      Helper to simplify getting all output states of a particular class, interface, or base class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseTransaction

        public BaseTransaction()

        An abstract class defining fields shared by all transaction types in the system.

    • Method Detail

      • getReferences

        public java.util.List<?> getReferences()

        A list of reusable reference data states which can be referred to by other contracts in this transaction.

      • getInputs

        public java.util.List<?> getInputs()

        The inputs of this transaction. Note that in BaseTransaction subclasses the type of this list may change!

      • getOutputs

        public java.util.List<net.corda.core.contracts.TransactionState> getOutputs()

        Ordered list of states defined by this transaction, along with the associated notaries.

      • getNotary

        public Party getNotary()

        If present, the notary for this transaction. If absent then the transaction is not notarised at all. This is intended for issuance/genesis transactions that don't consume any other states and thus can't double spend anything.

      • checkBaseInvariants

        public void checkBaseInvariants()

      • outRef

        public <T extends ContractState> StateAndRef<T> outRef(int index)

        Returns a class StateAndRef for the given output index.

        See Also:
        class StateAndRef

      • outRef

        public <T extends ContractState> StateAndRef<T> outRef(ContractState state)

        Returns a class StateAndRef for the requested output state, or throws IllegalArgumentException if not found.

        See Also:
        class StateAndRef, IllegalArgumentException

      • getOutputStates

        public java.util.List<net.corda.core.contracts.ContractState> getOutputStates()

        Helper property to return a list of interface ContractState objects, rather than the often less convenient class TransactionState

        See Also:
        interface ContractState, class TransactionState

      • getOutput

        public ContractState getOutput(int index)

        Helper to simplify getting an indexed output.

        Parameters:
        index - the position of the item in the output.
        Returns:
        The ContractState at the requested index

      • outputsOfType

        public <T extends ContractState> java.util.List<T> outputsOfType(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)

        Helper to simplify getting all output states of a particular class, interface, or base class.

        Parameters:
        clazz - The class type used for filtering via an Class.isInstance check. Clazz must be an extension of interface ContractState.
        Returns:
        the possibly empty list of output states matching the clazz restriction.

      • filterOutputs

        public <T extends ContractState> java.util.List<T> filterOutputs(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                                 java.util.function.Predicate<T> predicate)

        Helper to simplify filtering outputs according to a Predicate.

        Parameters:
        clazz - The class type used for filtering via an Class.isInstance check. Clazz must be an extension of interface ContractState.
        predicate - A filtering function taking a state of type T and returning true if it should be included in the list. The class filtering is applied before the predicate.
        Returns:
        the possibly empty list of output states matching the predicate and clazz restrictions.
        See Also:
        Predicate

      • findOutput

        public <T extends ContractState> T findOutput(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                              java.util.function.Predicate<T> predicate)

        Helper to simplify finding a single output matching a Predicate.

        Parameters:
        clazz - The class type used for filtering via an Class.isInstance check. Clazz must be an extension of interface ContractState.
        predicate - A filtering function taking a state of type T and returning true if this is the desired item. The class filtering is applied before the predicate.
        Returns:
        the single item matching the predicate.
        Throws:
        - if no item, or multiple items are found matching the requirements.
        See Also:
        Predicate

      • outRefsOfType

        public <T extends ContractState> java.util.List<net.corda.core.contracts.StateAndRef> outRefsOfType(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)

        Helper to simplify getting all output class StateAndRef items of a particular state class, interface, or base class.

        Parameters:
        clazz - The class type used for filtering via an Class.isInstance check. Clazz must be an extension of interface ContractState.
        Returns:
        the possibly empty list of output class StateAndRef states matching the clazz restriction.
        See Also:
        class StateAndRef

      • filterOutRefs

        public <T extends ContractState> java.util.List<net.corda.core.contracts.StateAndRef> filterOutRefs(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                                                                    java.util.function.Predicate<T> predicate)

        Helper to simplify filtering output class StateAndRef items according to a Predicate.

        Parameters:
        clazz - The class type used for filtering via an Class.isInstance check. Clazz must be an extension of interface ContractState.
        predicate - A filtering function taking a state of type T and returning true if it should be included in the list. The class filtering is applied before the predicate.
        Returns:
        the possibly empty list of output class StateAndRef states matching the predicate and clazz restrictions.
        See Also:
        class StateAndRef, Predicate

      • findOutRef

        public <T extends ContractState> StateAndRef<T> findOutRef(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                           java.util.function.Predicate<T> predicate)

        Helper to simplify finding a single output class StateAndRef matching a Predicate.

        Parameters:
        clazz - The class type used for filtering via an Class.isInstance check. Clazz must be an extension of interface ContractState.
        predicate - A filtering function taking a state of type T and returning true if this is the desired item. The class filtering is applied before the predicate.
        Returns:
        the single class StateAndRef item matching the predicate.
        Throws:
        - if no item, or multiple items are found matching the requirements.
        See Also:
        class StateAndRef, Predicate
